element.name: GetSurveyFullname
element.short: Returns a full name for a survey.

descr.p: aDate, the date of the survey
aSite, the survey locality
aMethod, the method used in the survey
aStation, the sampling plot or mistnet station
aID, used when the sampling plot is not informed

element.name: GetNetEffortFullname
element.short: Returns a full name for a net effort record.

descr.p: aDate, the date of the sampling
aStation, the mistnet station sampled
aNetNumber, the mistnet number in the station

element.name: GetIndividualFullname
element.short: Returns a full name for a individual.

descr.p: aTaxon, the taxon of the individual
aBand, the unique metal band
aRightLegBelow, the combination of metal/colored bands in the right leg
aLeftLegBelow, the combination of metal/colored bands in the left leg
aSex, the sex (male/female) of the individual
Formatted, format name with HTML if True

element.name: GetCaptureFullname
element.short: Returns a full name for a capture.

descr.p: aDate, the date of the capture
aTaxon, the taxon of the individual
aBand, the unique metal band
aSex, the sex (male/female) of the individual
aCaptureType, the type of capture (new, recapture, band change, ...)
aCycle, the molt cycle code
Formatted, format name with HTML if True

element.name: GetBandFullname
element.short: Returns a full name for a band

descr.p: aSize, the band size code
aNumber, the unique number
aSupplier, the band supplier

element.name: GetPermanentNetFullName
element.short: Returns a full name for a permanent mistnet.

descr.p: aNetStation, the mistnet station
aNetNumber, the number of the mistnet

element.name: GetNestFullName
element.short: Returns a full name for a nest.

descr.p: aDate, the date when the nest was found
aTaxon, the taxon of the nest
aSite, the locality where the nest was found
aFieldNumber, the field ID number (optional)

element.name: GetNestRevisionFullName
element.short: Returns a full name for a nest revision.

descr.p: aDate, the date of the revision
aNest, the nest revised
aStage, the stage the nest is in
aStatus, the status of the nest
